attributes.action: Make school dress codes more flexible for students
attributes.background: School uniforms are quite uncomfortable which distracts children from their learning in school. By changing the uniform standards, children will be able to be be comfortable and express themselves at the same time in school while still getting an education.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure exactly what action you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

You might want to sign this petition instead

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234997
